grape.embiggen.utils.graph_to_sparse_tensor package

Submodules

grape.embiggen.utils.graph_to_sparse_tensor.graph_to_sparse_tensor module

grape.embiggen.utils.graph_to_sparse_tensor.graph_to_sparse_tensor.graph_to_sparse_tensor(graph, use_weights)[source]

Returns provided graph as sparse Tensor.

Parameters

  • graph (Graph,) – The graph to convert.

  • use_weights (bool,) – Whether to load the graph weights.

Raises

  • ValueError, – If the weights are requested but the graph does not contain any.

  • ValueError, – If the graph contains singletons.

  • ValueError, – If the graph is a multigraph.

Returns

Return type

SparseTensor with (weighted) adjacency matrix.

Return type

SparseTensor
